snippet.title: OVRLRD | New map, comms & squad command systems
snippet.description:
Apologies for potato quality (making games doesn't mean you can run games). Showing off some of the latest changes, including a new 'ping' system, a diagetic comms and map UI for directing your squadmates, and some fancy new effects like rain and proper smoke trails - not that you can actually see how nice they are in this video.

I didn't realise when I was adding jump-jets that their main use would be to pop up out of cover and fire off a missile in mid-air, but it's super fun to do. Genuinely really enjoying the random skirmish mode and I hope everyone else does when it lands in the demo later this month!

Try the free demo and wishlist OVRLRD on steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2163160/
